TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DrillthroughEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks This is passed to the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.DrillthroughEventHandler> delegate when a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.Drillthrough> event occurs.
You can examine the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.DrillthroughEventArgs.ReportPath%2A> property and supply data corresponding to that report.
You can call the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.LocalReport.GetParameters%2A> method of the drillthrough report supplied in the `targetReport` parameter to examine the values of parameters being passed from the main report to the drillthrough report and to supply data corresponding to the parameter values.
## Examples For an example, please see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Drillthrough>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string reportPath, class Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.Report targetReport) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the target report of the drillthrough action.

remarks.format: ## Examples For an example, please see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Drillthrough>.

Docs.summary: Gets the path of the drillthrough report.
